trans-unit.source: <https://github.com/SamuelDeleglise/pyinstruments>
trans-unit.target: <https://github.com/SamuelDeleglise/pyinstruments>

trans-unit.source: 1/. The lower level layer is fully transparent for the user (pyivi provides a common interface for each instrument type).
trans-unit.target: 1/.La capa de nivel inferior es totalmente transparente para el usuario (pyivi proporciona una interfaz común para cada tipo de instrumento).

trans-unit.source: 2/. zero extra work is needed to interface an instrument for which an IVI driver is provided.
trans-unit.target: 2/. zero extra work is needed to interface an instrument for which an IVI driver is provided.

trans-unit.source: program less and do more science… better
trans-unit.target: program less and do more science… better

trans-unit.source: curvefinder to display in quasi real-time the curves acquired (This module could be run on any platform).
trans-unit.target: curvefinder to display in quasi real-time the curves acquired (This module could be run on any platform).

trans-unit.source: pyhardwaredb for the hardware communication (This package itself is a thin wrapper around pyhardware). Because it heavily relies on ivi-drivers and com-interoperability, this package is intended to run on a windows machine.
trans-unit.target: pyhardwaredb for the hardware communication (This package itself is a thin wrapper around pyhardware). Because it heavily relies on ivi-drivers and com-interoperability, this package is intended to run on a windows machine.

trans-unit.source: pyinstruments is a Python package to control/get data from measurement and automation devices. Control of the remote instruments can be done via one of the following protocols:
trans-unit.target: pyinstruments is a Python package to control/get data from measurement and automation devices. Control of the remote instruments can be done via one of the following protocols:

trans-unit.source: Control of data acquisition with remote instruments using IVI-C or IVI-COM, Visa, and serial protocols.
trans-unit.target: Control de la adquisición de datos con instrumentos remotos usando IVI-C o IVI-COM,Visa y protocolos seriales.

trans-unit.target: Las dependencias directas de los piinstrumentos son:

trans-unit.source: Installation
trans-unit.target: Instalación

trans-unit.source: Main Features
trans-unit.target: Características principales

trans-unit.source: PyQt4
trans-unit.target: PyQt4

trans-unit.source: The curves are stored in a (django-abstracted) database with all necessary metadata. (bandwidth, averaging, date, comment, name…) together with a list of user-defined tags to quickly identify the curves. The curvefinder module allows monitoring new incoming curves, as well as querying the database for old curve by date, tags… The hardware module has a Graphical User Interface to quickly get a curve from an instrument and configure the way instruments are interfaced.
trans-unit.target: The curves are stored in a (django-abstracted) database with all necessary metadata. (bandwidth, averaging, date, comment, name…) together with a list of user-defined tags to quickly identify the curves. The curvefinder module allows monitoring new incoming curves, as well as querying the database for old curve by date, tags… The hardware module has a Graphical User Interface to quickly get a curve from an instrument and configure the way instruments are interfaced.

trans-unit.source: The installation is single click (since v 0.1.15), desktop icons are created to launch both graphical user interfaces.
trans-unit.target: La instalación es de un solo clic (desde la v 0.1.15),se crean iconos de escritorio para lanzar ambas interfaces gráficas de usuario.

trans-unit.source: The other option to install pyinstruments is to use pip from a command shell (also available in pythonxy):
trans-unit.target: La otra opción para instalar pyinstrumentos es utilizar pip desde un shell de comando (también disponible en pythonxy):

trans-unit.source: The project is hosted on GitHub, and still in a starting phase, contributions and feedback are warmly welcome!
trans-unit.target: El proyecto está alojado en GitHub,y aún en una fase inicial,¡las contribuciones y la retroalimentación son muy bienvenidas!

trans-unit.source: The strict separation between plotting and data-acquistion processes ensures that scripted data-acquisitions won’t be affected by user interactions or plotting dead-times.
trans-unit.target: The strict separation between plotting and data-acquistion processes ensures that scripted data-acquisitions won’t be affected by user interactions or plotting dead-times.

trans-unit.source: The windows installer takes care of all the dependancies that are not standards in version 2.7.3.1 of pythonxy.
trans-unit.target: El instalador de Windows se encarga de todas las dependencias que no son estándares en la versión 2.7.3.1 de la pitonisa.

trans-unit.source: Try it out!
trans-unit.target: ¡Pruébalo!
